trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for data source controls that represent hierarchical data.
trans-unit.target: 为表示分层数据的数据源控件提供基类。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET supports a controls data-binding architecture that enables Web server controls to bind to data and present it in a consistent fashion.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 支持控件数据绑定体系结构，使 Web 服务器控件，若要将绑定到数据并将其呈现以一致的方式。

trans-unit.source: Web server controls that bind to data are called data-bound controls, and the classes that facilitate binding are called data source controls.
trans-unit.target: 将绑定到数据的 web 服务器控件称为数据绑定控件，并促进绑定的类称为数据源控件。

trans-unit.source: Data source controls can represent any data source: a file, a stream, a relational database, a business object, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 数据源控件可以表示任何数据源： 文件、 流、 关系数据库、 业务对象等。

trans-unit.source: Data source controls present data in a consistent way to data-bound controls, regardless of the source or format of the underlying data.
trans-unit.target: 数据源控件以数据绑定控件，而不考虑源或基础数据的格式一致的方式显示数据。

trans-unit.source: Data source controls that represent hierarchical data derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl> class, while data source controls that represent lists or tables of data derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 表示分层数据的数据源控件派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl>类，而表示列表或表的数据的数据源控件派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl> class is the base implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource> interface, which defines a single method to retrieve hierarchical data source view objects associated with the data source control, <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl>类是的基实现<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource>接口，定义了单个方法以检索与数据源控件关联的层次结构数据源视图对象，该接口<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A>。

trans-unit.source: You can think of a data source control as the combination of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl> object and its associated views on the underlying data, called data source view objects.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将数据源控件的视为的组合<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl>对象和其关联的视图的基础数据，称为数据源视图对象上。

trans-unit.source: While data source controls that represent tabular data are typically associated with only one named view, the <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl> class supports a data source view for each level of hierarchical data that the data source control represents.
trans-unit.target: 通常只有一个命名的视图，与关联表示表格数据的数据源控件时<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl>类为每个数据源控件表示的层次结构数据级别中支持的数据源视图。

trans-unit.source: The level of hierarchical data is identified by a unique hierarchical path, passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl.GetHierarchicalView%2A> method in the `viewPath` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 层次结构数据的级别由唯一的分层路径中，传递给<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl.GetHierarchicalView%2A>中的方法`viewPath`参数。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView> object defines the capabilities of a data source control for the hierarchical level represented, and performs operations such as insert, update, delete, and sort.
trans-unit.target: 每个<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView>对象定义的层次结构级别，一个数据源控件的功能，并执行如 insert、 update、 delete 和排序操作。

trans-unit.source: Web server controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>, use hierarchical data source controls to bind to hierarchical data.
trans-unit.target: Web 服务器控件派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>类，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>，使用层次结构数据源控件绑定到分层数据。

trans-unit.source: Data source controls are implemented as controls to enable declarative persistence and to optionally permit participation in state management.
trans-unit.target: 数据源控件实现为控件可启用声明性持久性以及 （可选） 允许参与状态管理。

trans-unit.source: Data source controls have no visual rendering, and therefore do not support themes.
trans-unit.target: 数据源控件具有没有可视化呈现，并因此不支持主题。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to extend the abstract <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl> class and the <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView> class, and implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable> and <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData> interfaces to create a hierarchical data source control that retrieves file system information.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何扩展抽象<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl>类和<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView>类，并实现<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable>和<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData>接口，以便创建层次结构的数据源控件，用于检索文件系统信息。

trans-unit.source: The `FileSystemDataSource` control enables Web server controls to bind to <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo> objects and display basic file system information.
trans-unit.target: `FileSystemDataSource`控制使 Web 服务器控件将绑定到<xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo>对象，并显示基本文件系统信息。

trans-unit.source: The `FileSystemDataSource` class in the example provides the implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl.GetHierarchicalView%2A> method, which retrieves a `FileSystemDataSourceView` object.
trans-unit.target: `FileSystemDataSource`在示例中的类提供的实现<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl.GetHierarchicalView%2A>方法，检索`FileSystemDataSourceView`对象。

trans-unit.source: The `FileSystemDataSourceView` object retrieves the data from the underlying data storage, in this case the file system information on the Web server.
trans-unit.target: `FileSystemDataSourceView`对象从基础数据存储，在此情况下在 Web 服务器上的文件系统信息中检索数据。

trans-unit.source: For security purposes, file system information is displayed only if the data source control is being used in a localhost, authenticated scenario, and only starts with the virtual directory that the Web Forms page using the data source control resides in.
trans-unit.target: 出于安全考虑，文件系统信息在 localhost 中使用数据源控件的情况下，才会显示，身份验证方案中，并仅启动使用数据源控件的 Web 窗体页所驻留的虚拟目录。

trans-unit.source: Finally, two classes that implement <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable> and <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData> are provided to wrap the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo> objects that `FileSystemDataSource` uses.
trans-unit.target: 最后，实现的两个类<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable>和<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData>提供包装<xref:System.IO.FileSystemInfo>对象`FileSystemDataSource`使用。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively bind a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control to file system data using the `FileSystemDataSource` example.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式将绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件添加到文件系统数据使用`FileSystemDataSource`示例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> containing the control.
trans-unit.target: 包含控件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" />。

trans-unit.source: Applies the style properties that are defined in the page style sheet to the control.
trans-unit.target: 将页样式表中定义的样式属性应用于控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the server control identifier generated by ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: 获取由 ASP.NET 生成的服务器控件标识符。

trans-unit.source: The server control identifier generated by ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: 由 ASP.NET 生成的服务器控件标识符。

trans-unit.source: This property is not used for data source controls.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不用于数据源控件。

trans-unit.source: This property is not used for data source controls.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不用于数据源控件。

trans-unit.source: This property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> base class is not used for data source controls because data source controls do not render markup.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>基类不使用数据源控件，因为数据源控件不呈现标记。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection" /> object that represents the child controls for a specified server control in the UI hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection" /> 对象，该对象表示 UI 层次结构中的指定服务器控件的子控件。

trans-unit.source: The collection of child controls for the specified server control.
trans-unit.target: 指定服务器控件的子控件的集合。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection" /> object to hold the child controls (both literal and server) of the server control.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection" /> 对象来保存服务器控件的子控件（包括文本控件和服务器控件）。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection" /> that prevents any child controls from being added.
trans-unit.target: 一个防止添加任何子控件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl.CreateControlCollection%2A> method is overridden by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl> class to prevent child controls from being added.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl.CreateControlCollection%2A>方法被重写通过<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl>类，以防止添加子控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this control supports themes.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示此控件是否支持主题。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl> class has no visual rendering, it does not support themes.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl>类具有没有可视化呈现，但它不支持主题。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set the value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl.EnableTheming" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 尝试设置 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl.EnableTheming" /> 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the control to be found.
trans-unit.target: 要查找的控件的标识符。

trans-unit.source: Searches the current naming container for a server control with the specified <paramref name="id" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在当前的命名容器中搜索带指定 <paramref name="id" /> 参数的服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: The specified control, or <see langword="null" /> if the specified control does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 指定的控件，如果指定的控件不存在则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets input focus to the control.
trans-unit.target: 为控件设置输入焦点。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl> class has no visual rendering, calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl.Focus%2A> method on it throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl>类具有没有可视化呈现时，调用<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl.Focus%2A>方法会引发<xref:System.NotSupportedException>异常。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to call the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl.Focus" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 尝试调用 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl.Focus" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The hierarchical path of the view to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要检索的视图的分层路径。

trans-unit.source: Gets the view helper object for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource" /> interface for the specified path.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定路径的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource" /> 接口的视图帮助器对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView" /> that represents a single view of the data at the hierarchical level identified by the <paramref name="viewPath" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView" />，代表由 <paramref name="viewPath" /> 参数所标识的分层级别上的数据的单个视图。

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl.GetHierarchicalView%2A> method provides the default implementation for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl> class, which simply returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 这<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl.GetHierarchicalView%2A>方法提供的默认实现<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl>类，它仅返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl> class override this method and provide an implementation to return a strongly typed view that derives from <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView>.
trans-unit.target: 派生自的类<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl>类重写此方法并提供一个实现以返回派生自的强类型化的视图<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl.GetHierarchicalView%2A> method in a class that extends the <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl> class to return a strongly typed <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView> object.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl.GetHierarchicalView%2A>中扩展的类的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl>类以返回强类型化<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView>对象。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl>类。

trans-unit.source: Determines if the server control contains any child controls.
trans-unit.target: 确定服务器控件是否包含任何子控件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control contains other controls; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件包含其他控件，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource.DataSourceChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource.DataSourceChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> method notifies a data-bound control that the underlying data source or the data cached in memory has changed, that the control should rebind, and that any necessary work should be performed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>方法通知基础数据源或缓存在内存中的数据已更改，该控件应重新绑定，并将应执行任何必要的工作的数据绑定控件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl.OnDataSourceChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl.OnDataSourceChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl.OnDataSourceChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 时，一定要调用基类的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl.OnDataSourceChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object that receives the control content.
trans-unit.target: 接收控件内容的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Outputs server control content to a provided <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object and stores tracing information about the control if tracing is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 将服务器控件内容输出到所提供的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 对象，如果启用了跟踪，则还将存储有关该控件的跟踪信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the skin to apply to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置应用于 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl" /> 控件的外观。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl> has no visual rendering, it does not support themes or skins.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl>没有可视化呈现时，它不支持主题或外观。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set the value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl.SkinID" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 尝试设置 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl.SkinID" /> 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The hierarchical path of the view to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要检索的视图的分层路径。

trans-unit.source: Gets the view helper object for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource" /> interface for the specified path.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定路径的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource" /> 接口的视图帮助器对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView" /> that represents a single view of the data at the hierarchical level identified by the <paramref name="viewPath" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView" />，代表由 <paramref name="viewPath" /> 参数所标识的分层级别上的数据的单个视图。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A> method is called by clients when a <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl> is manipulated as an <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A>方法由客户端调用时<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl>操作作为<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource>接口。

trans-unit.source: It delegates to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl.GetHierarchicalView%2A> method, which derived classes override to return strongly typed <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView> objects.
trans-unit.target: 委托给<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl.GetHierarchicalView%2A>方法，派生类重写，以返回强类型化<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView>对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control is visually displayed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否以可视化方式显示控件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl> class has no visual rendering, <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl.Visible%2A> always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl>类具有没有可视化呈现，<xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl.Visible%2A>始终返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set the value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl.Visible" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 尝试设置 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl.Visible" /> 属性的值。
